title: Prescriptive Curriculum Design for Strengthening Foundational Informatics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Introductory non-degree online course focusing on systematically acquiring core informatics concepts, with emphasis on foundational data analysis and logical problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Students can analyze real-life problems in a structured manner using mathematical modeling techniques for information representation.
Students can design and implement algorithms applying basic data structures (arrays, trees, graphs).
Students can conduct projects to identify data patterns and build predictive models using statistical inference techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
